purpose: The email announces the opening of applications for the 2025 Summer School on Informatics Education Research (SCHIER), which is the only summer school in Europe focused on this field. It provides details about the event, including dates, location, target audience, registration fees, and application deadlines. The email encourages interested PhD students, postdocs, and researchers to apply and highlights the benefits of attending.
evidence_sentences: Applications are now open for the 2025 Summer School on Informatics Education Research (SCHIER).
SCHIER: the only summer school in Europe exclusively focused on research in Informatics Education.
[Who should attend] PhD students, postdocs, and researchers with an interest in Informatics Education Research
Applications are now open, limited to 40 participants on a first-come, first-served basis.
Don’t miss this unique opportunity to engage with a vibrant community of researchers shaping the future of Informatics Education in Europe!
